snippet: The Brooklyn Women’s Exchange, a shop selling handmade wares, was founded in Brooklyn Heights in 1854, helping women in need sell needlework and handicrafts without resorting to factory work.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Brooklyn Women's Exchange, nonprofit, volunteer-run shop selling handmade wares in Brooklyn Heights.
lead_paragraph: The Brooklyn Women’s Exchange, a shop selling handmade wares, was founded in Brooklyn Heights in 1854, helping women in need sell needlework and handicrafts without resorting to factory work.
